subject: Order #SSN4226 - Wrong Color Delivered
description_text:
Hello!

I have just received my Plus X Pedals with baseplate. Unfortunately the
product delivered is the silver color but I had ordered the black version!

Are you able to secure an exchange for the correct color?

It's unfortunate because the shipping must be quite expensive. The pedals
are very nice though!

I understand there's a lot of orders right now with Black Friday and the
holidays, but thank you for considering my request!

~Tyler

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9467 中
